content:
# I successfully harvested 10 more iron ore, bringing my total to 10 iron ore in the inventory along with 2 iron plates.
# Now, I can return to the stone furnace to smelt the iron ore into iron plates.

# I will insert the 10 iron ore into the furnace for smelting and ensure it has enough coal to operate.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace_entity, quantity=10)  # Inserting all 10 iron ore into the furnace
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace_entity, quantity=5)  # Ensuring the furnace has enough coal for smelting

# Now, I will check the furnace's inventory and status after the insertions.
furnace_inventory = inspect_inventory(furnace_entity)  # Inspecting the furnace's inventory
print(f"Furnace Inventory: {furnace_inventory}")  # Checking what's in the furnace's inventory
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Displaying any updates on the entities
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking the main inventory after insertions
